SELECT h.id, h.house_num, h.project_id, building_id, floor_id, house_type, actual_area, gross_area, usable_area, apportion_area, fs.price as property_fee, sale_status, ownership, pay_type, p.name as name, p.id as proprietorId, ph.use_type as useType, pj.full_name as projectName, pb.name as buildingName, pf.name as floorName FROM property.t_house h left join property.t_proprietor_house ph on h.house_num = ph.house_num and h.project_id = ph.project_id left join property.t_proprietor p on ph.proprietor_id = p.id left join property.t_project pj on h.project_id = pj.id left join property.t_project_building pb on h.building_id = pb.id left join property.t_project_building pf on h.floor_id = pf.id left join property.t_fee_setting fs on fs.project_id = ph.project_id and fs.use_type = ph.use_type and fs.fee_type = '4' Where h.id = #{id}
mapper.sql: (SELECT p.id AS projectId, p.full_name AS projectName, pb.id AS buildingId, pb.name AS buildingName, pf.id AS floorId, pf.name AS floorName, CONCAT(pb.code, pf.code, hs.num) AS houseNum, h.id AS houseId, sd.name AS houseType, pro.name AS name, p.oem_code AS oemCode FROM property.t_project p LEFT JOIN property.t_project_building pb ON pb.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN property.t_project_building pf ON pf.parent_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house_spec hs ON hs.building_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house h ON h.house_num = CONCAT(pb.code,pf.code,hs.num) AND h.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor_house phs ON phs.house_num = h.house_num AND phs.project_id = h.project_id LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor pro ON pro.id = phs.proprietor_id LEFT JOIN property.t_sys_dict sd ON sd.group_code = 'HOUSE_TYPE' AND sd.value = hs.house_type WHERE CONCAT(pb.code,pf.code,hs.num) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.id)
